channel.title: GolemXScape
channel.description:
Hey moparscape! I just registered finally. I waiting for a long time for an email to my hotmail and then i tried gmail and it worked. Ok so the purpose of this thread is to advertise the new rsps i have been coding for the past long time. The server is named GolemXScape, and my name on it is Owner GolemX. We have great staff and we are looking for 2 mods so the 2 next people to register will be mods. The server is delta/allstar/317 so that means it is oldschool, i love oldschool rsps and thats why i made this rsps. Our staff team :
OWNERS Owner GolemX Co GolemX
ADMINS White Angel (head admin) Dano Nightbane
Mods Maxed Legend (head mod) (next to sign up wins) (next to sign up wins)
Ok thats the staff list. Now my server is great i coded alot onto it, mostly commands. I used an allstar-scape source and i added alot of commands. If you want to know some of the commands, here they are:
::commands ::bash ::roll (55x2 dice) ::2roll (70x3 dice) ::3roll (85x5 dice) ::cg (color game) ::gamble (takes you to gambling area) ::rares ::agsmini ::dclawmini ::phatmini ::christmasevent ::afk AND MORE!
Mod commands ::jail ::unjail ::mod ::food ::xteleto ::xteletome ::modarm (custom mod armour) AND MORE
admins ::1hit ::adminarn ::banuser ::unban ::alltome AND MORE
-admin emotes ::ufloat ::zap ::drunk ::fun AND MORE
Thanks for reading -OGolemX
Www.golemxscape.smffy.com Www.golemxscape.smffy.com Www.golemxscape.smffy.com Www.golemxscape.smffy.com Www.golemxscape.smffy.com
Register now and start playing! Bye moparscape sorry for no pics, im on my ipod atm.

item.title: GolemXScape
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

You dont need to know the owner commands because you need to donate 50$ or 100m rsgp for owner.

[quote=“Taharok, post:1, topic:445166”][ul][li]You are not allowed to sell anything on this website, no matter what. If you wish to sell anything related to your server, do it outside this site. We are not responsible for anything exchanged out of this website.[/li]
[li]There is one exact restriction. On this website or off, staff ranks must not be sold for anything.[/li][/ul][/quote]

And just when I thought this server was going to be amazing, especially with all the commands.

Read full topic

item.title: GolemXScape

@OGolemX wrote:

Hey moparscape! I just registered finally. I waiting for a long time for an email to my hotmail and then i tried gmail and it worked. Ok so the purpose of this thread is to advertise the new rsps i have been coding for the past long time. The server is named GolemXScape, and my name on it is Owner GolemX. We have great staff and we are looking for 2 mods so the 2 next people to register will be mods. Dano

(next to sign up wins)

Ok thats the staff list. Now my server is great i coded alot onto it, mostly commands. I used an allstar-scape source and i added alot of commands. If you want to know some of the commands, here they are:
